document_data.name: Livewood Core
document_data.mainbody: e ''livewood core'' provided wide-ranging protection and fortification against most threats. It caused vines, bark, and moss to grow over the warforged body and add a layer of magical defenses.
document_data.Powers: The ''livewood core'' provided wide-ranging protection and fortification against most threats. It caused vines, bark, and moss to grow over the warforged body and add a layer of magical defenses.
document_data.History: The core was found in the Thorn Hollow caverns of [[Thorngap]], at a time that the [[druid]] [[Halsaime]] had taken over and corrupted nature into being his tool.
